reg_info.act_under: Ontario Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals Act

content.content: 1. Subsections 11.2 (1) and (2) of the Act do not apply to, (a) persons who are hunting as permitted under the Fish and Wildlife Conservation Act, 1997, other than as described in clause 11.2 (6) (a) of the Act; or (b) persons who permit hunting as described in clause (a).  O. Reg. 62/09, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. Subsections 11.2 (1) and (2) of the Act do not apply to,

(a) persons who are hunting as permitted under the Fish and Wildlife Conservation Act, 1997, other than as described in clause 11.2 (6) (a) of the Act; or

(b) persons who permit hunting as described in clause (a).  O. Reg. 62/09, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 62/09, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 62/09, s. 2.
